Product Distribution

Source: R/Wrapper_ProductDistribution.R
ProductDistribution.Rd

A wrapper for creating the joint distribution of two indepdendent probability distributions.

Details

Exploits the following relationships of independent distributions $$f_P(x1, x2) = f_X1(x1) * f_X2(x2)$$ $$F_P(x1, x2) = F_X1(x1) * F_X2(x2)$$ where f_P/F_P is the pdf/cdf of the joint (product) distribution P and X1,X2 are independent distributions.

ProductDistribution inherits all methods from Distribution and DistributionWrapper.

Constructor Arguments

ArgumentTypeDetails
dist1distributionFirst distribution for product.
dist2distributionSecond distribution for product.

See also

ArrayDistribution and Distribution. As well as DistributionWrapper for wrapper details.

Examples

prodBin <- ProductDistribution$new(Binomial$new(prob = 0.5, size = 10),
                                   Binomial$new(prob = 0.5, size = 20))
prodBin$pdf(x1 = 2, x2 =3)
#> [1] 4.777685e-05
prodBin$cdf(x1 = 5, x2 = 10)
#> [1] 0.3664129
